HTML.BODY:
LC index
This index was derived from indices available at the Western Semitic Research Project (WSRP). Range of text folios: 1v - 463r, 924 pages including 3 pages with only Masoretic notes.
The WSRP html files have been concatenated and modified for machine processing at the Tanach.us site. Every range entry has a starting chapter:verse reference, a dash "-", followed by an ending chapter:verse reference. Every book has its first and last verses given in the "Range" column. Page IDs are duplicated when two books appear on the same page.
